channel.title: Resumes on Matt Gibson
channel.description: Recent content in Resumes on Matt Gibson

item.title: Education
item.description: Education I am currently attending the University of Texas at Austin, where I will earn a Bachelor of Science and Arts degree in Biology with certificates in Pre-health and Forensic Science. I am on track to graduate in May 2020. Skills I have strong personal and leadership skills. I also have a basic skills in R-Studio.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, my name is Matt Gibson! I am currently a senior at the University of Texas at Austin studying biology. I was born and raised as a Longhorn here in Austin so attending UT had always been a dream of mine! I enjoy sports, both watching and playing, traveling and spending time with friends and family. I also have a two year old Golden Retriever named Nala! Hereâ€™s a picture of her eating whats left of a cupcake on her birthday:

item.title: Community Service
item.description: Riverbend Church -Volunteered as youth leader at Vacation Bible School Westlake Hills Presbyterian Church -Volunteered for church mission trip to New Orleans - provided companionship and quality of life assistance to the elderly and individuals with special needs Austin 10/20 Race -Volunteered for race support crew prior to and day of event Youth Basketball Coach -Coached recreational youth basketball for the Westlake Youth Basketball Association (WYBA)

item.title: Work Experience
item.description: Lost Creek Country Club -Lifeguard -Summer 2015-present The County Line BBQ -Waiter -Summer 2018 Independent -Mass Marketing mailer preparation -Summer 2016, 2017 Intership -Interned at Neal Dental Group in Austin, Texas -Fall 2017
